q: Steven Tyler , 62, revealed on`` The Late Show with David Letterman '' Monday that during the accident- which led to broken bones and the cancellation of Aerosmith's tour- he was high. It's not any news here about my drug use and addictions in the past, the frontman said when asked about the tumble.`` A couple years ago, you know, I was doing Lunesta because I had some problems with my feet.''
